body:
https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/12519193186f03ecd044d9701d28538397a88cf4/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fabtests/package.py#L14

the ofiwg/libfabric is a good start, but this package should also point to https://github.com/aws/libfabric for versions with EFA enabled. For example, version 1.10.1amzn1.1
title: EFA support
